text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Authority" means a nonprofit or quasi-governmental entity created by a municipal corporation under § 54 of this subtitle.
"Board" means the board of directors of an authority.

section.section: "Bond" means a bond issued by an authority under this subtitle.
"Bond" includes a bond, a refunding bond, a note, and any other obligation.

"Project" means any organized plan carried out by an authority in relation to:
Acquiring and rehabilitating abandoned and dilapidated properties; and
Marketing and leasing or selling the rehabilitated properties.
"Revenues" means the income, revenue, and other money an authority receives from or in connection with a project and all other income of an authority.
"Revenues" includes grants, rentals, rates, fees, and charges.

text.section: "Tax sale property" means property or an interest in property sold by the tax collector of the county in accordance with Title 14, Subtitle 8, Part III of the Tax - Property Article.

section.section: "Trust agreement" means an agreement entered into by an authority to secure a bond.
"Trust agreement" may include a bond contract, bond resolution, or other contract with or for the benefit of a bondholder.
